entries.name: new( parent = nil )
entries.desc: Constructor.  Any inheritors of this class should call super to make sure this method is called.

entries.name: document()
entries.desc: the document this child belongs to, or nil if this child

entries.name: next_sibling=( other )
entries.desc: Sets the next sibling of this child.  This can be used to insert a child after some other child.

entries.name: parent=( other )
entries.desc: Sets the parent of this child to the supplied argument.

entries.name: previous_sibling=(other)
entries.desc: Sets the previous sibling of this child.  This can be used to insert a child before some other child.

entries.name: remove()
entries.desc: Removes this child from the parent.

entries.name: replace_with( child )
entries.desc: Replaces this object with another object.  Basically, calls REXML::Parent#replace_child
